headline: S&P 500 Gains and Losses Today: Index Slips as Stocks Close Out Strong Year
summary: The S&P 500 fell on Tuesday, Dec. 31, 2024, stumbling into the finish line at the end of an upbeat year for stock market returns.

raw.headline: S&P 500 Gains and Losses Today: Index Slips as Stocks Close Out Strong Year
raw.summary: The S&P 500 fell on Tuesday, Dec. 31, 2024, stumbling into the finish line at the end of an upbeat year for stock market returns.

headline: Top Stock Movers Now: Moderna, Verisign, Dave, and More
summary: U.S. equities were closing out 2024 by edging lower at midday after opening the session higher.

headline: Moderna: 2025 Contrarian Play
summary: Moderna is a contrarian play for 2025, despite a rough 2024 as one of the worst-performing Nasdaq-100 stocks. Read the full stock report on Seeking Alpha.

raw.headline: Moderna: 2025 Contrarian Play
raw.summary: Moderna is a contrarian play for 2025, despite a rough 2024 as one of the worst-performing Nasdaq-100 stocks. Read the full stock report on Seeking Alpha.

headline: This Biotech Is One of the S&P 500’s Worst Performers. It Looks Too Cheap.
summary: Shares have been hammered by disappointing Covid vaccine sales, the company’s heavy losses—an estimated $9 a share for 2024—and management’s move to push out the year of projected profitability to 2028 from 2026.

raw.headline: This Biotech Is One of the S&P 500’s Worst Performers. It Looks Too Cheap.
